author: Special Correspondent
text:
As many as 128 beneficiaries received gold coins weighing four gm and cash on Friday under the various marriage assistance schemes of the State government.

Women who have completed their degree or postgraduation are eligible for Rs. 50,000 towards marriage expenses through the Moovalur Ramarathinam Ammaiyar Ninaivu Marriage Assistance Scheme.

The schemes are implemented by the Social Welfare Department. Minister B. Valarmathi distributed gold coins to 124 women under the Muthulakshmi Reddy Intercaste Scheme and four women benefited through the EVR Maniammaiyar Scheme, according to a release.
title: Assistance distributed
